医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
新的伙伴关系解决了监管数字心理健康技术的关键挑战由 Wellcome 资助的 MHRA 和 NICE 合作伙伴关系正在根据患者、公众和心理健康专业人士的意见，解决监管和评估数字心理健康技术 (DMHT) 的关键挑战。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240511/New-partnership-addresses-key-challenges-for-regulate-digital-mental-health-technologies.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240511/New-partnership-addresses-key-challenges-for-regulate-digital-mental-health-technologies.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=931fc7e0-f7c5-4980-92ca-da3764017d3a Sat, 11 May 2024 08:34:00 -0400 New partnership addresses key challenges for regulating digital mental health technologies
美因茨 Biomed 将在 DDW 2024 上公布突破性早期癌症检测研究结果Mainz Biomed NV 是一家专门从事癌症早期检测的分子遗传学诊断公司，将于 5 月 18 日至 21 日在华盛顿特区举办的 2024 年消化疾病周 (DDW) 上展示其 eAArly DETECT 研究的分析结果。 DDW 被公认为胃肠病学、肝病学、内窥镜检查和胃肠外科最新进展的首要论坛。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240511/Mainz-Biomed-to-unveil-breakthrough-early-cancer-detection-study-results-at-DDW-2024.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240511/Mainz-Biomed-to-unveil-breakthrough-early-cancer-detection-study-results-at-DDW-2024.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1f9c647a-d8e3-41fc-badb-6d101c80e3ec Sat, 11 May 2024 08:28:00 -0400 Mainz Biomed to unveil breakthrough early cancer detection study results at DDW 2024
气候友好型沙丁胺醇吸入器的早期可行性研究已完成DevPro Biopharma 和 Bespak 宣布完成 DP007 的早期可行性研究，DP007 是加压定量吸入器 (pMDI) 中沙丁胺醇的新配方，其性能与 Ventolin® HFA 相当，但温室气体排放量显着减少。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240511/Early-feasibility-studies-on-climate-friend-albuterol-inhaler-completed.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240511/Early-feasibility-studies-on-climate-friend-albuterol-inhaler-completed.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1f1677d6-05ab-42f5-ba86-662a30edbded Sat, 11 May 2024 08:25:00 -0400 Early feasibility studies on climate-friendly albuterol inhaler completed
斯克里普斯研究中心名誉教授约翰·约翰逊当选为美国国家科学院院士斯克里普斯研究中心名誉教授约翰·约翰逊博士已当选为美国国家科学院院士，这是授予科学家的最高荣誉之一。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240511/Scripps-Research-professor-emeritus-John-Johnson-selected-as-member-of-the-National-Academy-of-Sciences.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240511/Scripps-Research-professor-emeritus-John-Johnson-selected-as-member-of-the-National-Academy-of-Sciences.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d7d2328f-16f3-44c5-b186-0bac53849309 Sat, 11 May 2024 08:21:00 -0400 Scripps Research professor emeritus John Johnson selected as member of the National Academy of Sciences
NHS 仍面临候补名单挑战健康基金会政策助理主任蒂姆·加德纳 (Tim Gardner) 在评论今天发布的 NHS 月度绩效统计数据时表示。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240511/NHS-still-faces-waiting-list-challenges.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240511/NHS-still-faces-waiting-list-challenges.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d784233d-7210-49e8-bbcc-8fc6c406273d Sat, 11 May 2024 08:03:00 -0400 NHS still faces waiting list challenges
扩大超突变尿路上皮癌的治疗范围，超越免疫疗法2024 年 4 月 25 日，《Oncoscience》（第 11 卷）发表了一篇新的社论论文，题为“免疫疗法之外的超突变尿路上皮癌的治疗机会”。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240510/Expanding-treatment-horizo​​ns-for-hypermutated-urothelial-carcinomas-beyond-immunotherapy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240510/Expanding-treatment-horizo​​ns-for-hypermutated-urothelial-carcinomas-beyond-immunotherapy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=65ac6012-5185-4b05-a4ff-e9de6ac5599c Fri, 10 May 2024 23:22:20 -0400 Expanding treatment horizons for hypermutated urothelial carcinomas beyond immunotherapy
了解婴儿视力：日常生活输入与发育营养婴儿看到什么？他们看什么？对于最小的婴儿来说，这些问题的答案与对于较大的婴儿、儿童和成人来说是非常不同的。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240510/Understanding-infant-vision-Daily-life-input-and-developmental-nourishment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240510/Understanding-infant-vision-Daily-life-input-and-developmental-nourishment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c143e3d2-0879-44ee-81ba-d0c57ceb48db Fri, 10 May 2024 23:18:18 -0400 Understanding infant vision: Daily-life input and developmental nourishment
研究强调黑色素瘤诊断和结果中种族和性别的差异黑色素瘤是一种侵袭性皮肤癌，占所有皮肤癌相关死亡的 75%，通常在肤色较深的人中较晚才被发现；梅奥诊所的一项研究表明，其后果可能是毁灭性的。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240510/Study-spotlights-differences-based-on-race-and-gender-in-melanoma-diagnosis-outcomes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240510/Study-spotlights-differences-based-on-race-and-gender-in-melanoma-diagnosis-outcomes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8a3c2a46-9fdc-4e33-ac8e-b2ae92ece1da Fri, 10 May 2024 22:58:12 -0400 Study spotlights differences based on race and gender in melanoma diagnosis, outcomes
新的生物医学工程创新显示出改变创伤护理和外科实践的潜力发表在《科学转化医学》上的一项突破性研究以生物医学工程创新为特色，有可能改变创伤护理和外科实践。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240510/New-biomedical-engineering-innovation-shows-pottial-to-transform-trauma-care-and-surgical-practices.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240510/New-biomedical-engineering-innovation-shows-potential-to-transform-trauma-care-and-surgical-practices.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a608a607-1164-4342-bf7c-4d4c3fddefd5 Fri, 10 May 2024 22:32:08 -0400 New biomedical engineering innovation shows potential to transform trauma care and surgical practices
研究揭示了患有遗传性疾病的儿童的照顾者所面临的挑战当谈到改善患有遗传性疾病的儿童的生活时，医学研究通常只关注儿童。但科罗拉多大学医学系的一位教员强调，还有一个同样重要的人群需要研究：照顾者。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240510/Study-sheds-light-on-challenges-faced-by-caregivers-of-children-with-genic-conditions.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240510/Study-sheds-light-on-challenges-faced-by-caregivers-of-children-with-genic-conditions.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fdd94e35-a7ce-4e5d-b754-25af69bb1fdf Fri, 10 May 2024 22:15:02 -0400 Study sheds light on challenges faced by caregivers of children with genetic conditions
